title: Trek to Pikey Peak 9N/10D
description: Outline Itinerary Day DAY 1: Arrival in Kathmandu and transfer to hotel Day DAY 2: : Drive from Kathmandu to Dhap Bazaar (2850m) ‚Äì 8 Hours Day DAY 3: ...

itinerary.title: Day DAY
itinerary.description:
1: Arrival in Kathmandu and transfer to hotel
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Begin your trek in Nepal with a warm welcome in Kathmandu, the cultural and historical heart of the region of Nepal. Upon landing at Tribhuvan International Airport, a representative will assist you with your Nepal entry visa and transfer to your hotel. Enjoy the rest of the day exploring Thamel and preparing for your Pikey Peak adventure.

itinerary.title: Day DAY
itinerary.description:
2: : Drive from Kathmandu to Dhap Bazaar (2850m) ‚Äì 8 Hours
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            The drive from Kathmandu to Dhap takes you along scenic roads tracing the Sunkoshi River, leading to the beautiful village of Dhap Bazaar. This marks the start of the trekking trail in the Everest region. This drive from Kathmandu gives you the first glimpse of Nepal's countryside, terraced fields, and mountain views.

itinerary.title: Day DAY
itinerary.description:
3: Trek from Dhap to Japre (2815m) ‚Äì 14 km / 4-5 Hours
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Today your real trekking experience begins as you trek from Dhap to Japre, passing through remote trails and scenic ridges. This trekking route offers initial views of Everest and Numbur Himal, and your altitude gradually increases. The village of Japre features a beautiful monastery and panoramic scenery.

itinerary.title: Day DAY
itinerary.description:
4: Trek from Jhapre to Pikey Peak Base Camp (3640m) ‚Äì 13.7 km / 5-6 Hours
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            The trek from Jhapre to Pikey offers forested paths, yak pastures, and mani walls, leading to Pikey Peak Base Camp. As you reach Pikey base, soak in the tranquil atmosphere and prepare for the summit of Pikey Peak the next morning. This day provides the perfect mix of nature and spiritual landmarks.

itinerary.title: Day DAY
itinerary.description:
5: Hike to Pikey Peak (4065m) and Descend to Jase Bhanjyang ‚Äì 5 km
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Rise early for the hike to Pikey Peak, the highest point of the journey. At the top of Pikey Peak, enjoy the stunning sunrise and the iconic view from Pikey Peak. From here, you can see Mount Everest, Kanchenjunga, Dhaulagiri, Mera Peak, and many other Himalayan giants. The panorama from Pikey Peak is truly breathtaking.

itinerary.title: Day DAY
itinerary.description:
6: Trek from Jase Bhanjyang to Junbesi (2680m) ‚Äì 11 km / 5-6 Hours
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Continue your descent and trek to Junbesi, a traditional Sherpa village rich in culture. The trail passes through meadows and forests, with stops at a monastery and local tea houses. Junbesi is one of the highlights of the pikey peak trek route.

itinerary.title: Day DAY
itinerary.description:
7: Trek from Junbesi to Phaplu (2380m) ‚Äì 13.2 km / 5-6 Hours
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            The trek to Phaplu takes you along the valley trek route beside Junbesi Khola. The trail descends through lush terrain before reaching Phaplu, where you can enjoy local culture, sample traditional food, and relax.

itinerary.title: Day DAY
itinerary.description:
8: Drive from Phaplu to Kathmandu ‚Äì 9/10 Hours
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Today you conclude your trek with a scenic drive from Phaplu to Kathmandu. Once back in the city, enjoy a traditional farewell dinner to celebrate your successful days on Pikey Peak Trek.

itinerary.title: Day DAY
itinerary.description:
9: Final Departure from Kathmandu
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            After completing your memorable Pikey Peak trek in Nepal, you will be transferred to the airport. Our team ensures a smooth send-off and wishes you well on your onward journey.

booking_info.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 7 days before departure

title: Muktinath Bike Tour-11N/12D
description: Ride to Mustang: 12-Day Himalayan Motorbike Adventure from KathmanduThe Journey of a LifetimeImagine this: you‚Äôre cruising through Nepal‚Äôs ever-changi...

itinerary.title: Day 1
itinerary.description:
: Day 1: Welcome to Kathmandu (1,400m)
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            As your flight descends into the Kathmandu Valley, you‚Äôll already sense the contrast‚Äîlush green hills ring the ancient city, and the chaos of Kathmandu pulses below. Our representative will greet you at Tribhuvan International Airport and transfer you to your hotel in the heart of the capital. Depending on your arrival time, you can explore the vibrant Thamel neighborhood or rest and recover from your journey. In the evening, join the team for a welcome dinner and a detailed briefing about your upcoming adventure ‚Äî the route, safety protocols, and what to expect on the road.
üìçOvernight: Kathmandu
 üçΩ Meals: Welcome Dinner

itinerary.title: Day 2
itinerary.description:
: Day 2: Kathmandu Heritage Ride & Bike Preparation
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Today‚Äôs all about orientation ‚Äî both cultural and practical. After breakfast, join your guide for a short ride around Kathmandu‚Äôs cultural gems like Swayambhunath Stupa (Monkey Temple), the sacred Pashupatinath Temple, and Boudhanath Stupa. It‚Äôs a chance to ease into riding mode while soaking in Nepal‚Äôs rich spiritual heritage. In the afternoon, finalize your paperwork, check your gear, and get fitted to your motorbike. A mechanic will help you do a full technical check. Later, the group will gather for a pre-departure talk with your road captain.
üìçOvernight: Kathmandu
 üçΩ Meals: Breakfast

itinerary.title: Day 3
itinerary.description:
: Kathmandu to Bandipur
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Distance: ~145 km | Ride Time: 5‚Äì6 hours
Start your engines! After an early breakfast, you‚Äôll ride out of Kathmandu and hit the Prithvi Highway. The route follows the Trishuli River, with rolling hills and terraced fields keeping you company. Take a break midway for lunch before the road winds upward to the beautifully preserved hill town of Bandipur. Once a bustling trade hub between Tibet and India, Bandipur still exudes old-world charm with its cobbled streets, restored homes, and panoramic views of Manaslu and the Annapurna range. It‚Äôs the perfect first stop to ease into the journey.
üìçOvernight: Bandipur
 üçΩ Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Day 4
itinerary.description:
: Bandipur to Kusma
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Distance: ~100 km |  Ride Time: 4‚Äì5 hours
The ride from Bandipur to Kusma is relatively short but rich in local flavor. Pass through picturesque villages, terraced farms, and mid-hill settlements. As you approach Kusma, the landscape becomes more dramatic, with deep gorges and hanging bridges. In fact, Kusma is known for having one of the world‚Äôs highest suspension bridges, stretching over the Kaligandaki Gorge. The town is calm and lesser explored, offering a peaceful overnight stop with stunning views and cultural charm.
üìçOvernight: Kusma
 üçΩ Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Day 5
itinerary.description:
: Kusma to Lete
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Distance: ~110 km |  Ride Time: 5‚Äì6 hours
Now the adventure intensifies. After breakfast, ride through Beni ‚Äî the gateway to Mustang ‚Äî and gradually ascend alongside the Kali Gandaki River. The tarmac gives way to gravel as the air grows thinner. This stretch offers thrilling off-road riding and raw, untouched scenery. You‚Äôll ride under cascading waterfalls, across wooden bridges, and past wild cliffs as you approach Lete, a small settlement nestled beneath Nilgiri and Dhaulagiri. This is true Himalayan wilderness.
üìçOvernight: Lete
 üçΩ Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Day 6
itinerary.description:
: Lete to Muktinath
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Distance: ~80 km | Ride Time: 5 hours
Today, you‚Äôre riding to Mustang's spiritual core ‚Äî Muktinath. Pass through Marpha, a beautiful Thakali village famous for its apple orchards and whitewashed alleys. Continue through Jomsom, the district headquarters, and begin your ascent to Muktinath at 3,800 meters. The journey is challenging, with narrow tracks, loose gravel, and alpine winds. Upon reaching, visit the revered Muktinath Temple, where 108 water taps and an eternal flame await. It‚Äôs a sacred site for both Hindus and Buddhists ‚Äî a powerful place to pause and reflect.
üìçOvernight: Muktinath
 üçΩ Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Day 7
itinerary.description:
: Muktinath to Tatopani
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Distance: ~100 km | Ride Time: 5‚Äì6 hours
After an early morning walk or meditation near the temple, you‚Äôll start your descent back through the Kali Gandaki Valley. The ride down is smoother but still thrilling ‚Äî with cliffs, switchbacks, and dramatic mountain views all around. By afternoon, you‚Äôll arrive in Tatopani, a village named after its famous natural hot springs. Dip in the warm waters and let your muscles relax ‚Äî a perfect remedy after several high-altitude riding days.
üìçOvernight: Tatopani

itinerary.title: Day 8
itinerary.description:
: Tatopani to Pokhara
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Distance: ~100 km | Ride Time: 5 hours
Continue your descent into the lowlands as pine forests give way to rice terraces and colorful towns. The ride is more comfortable today as you reach Pokhara, Nepal‚Äôs most popular lakeside city. Upon arrival, settle into your hotel, take a stroll along Phewa Lake, and enjoy the luxury of paved roads and laid-back caf√©s. A great evening to celebrate the halfway mark of your ride.
üìçOvernight: Pokhara
 üçΩ Meals: Breakfast

itinerary.title: Day 9
itinerary.description:
: Pokhara Sightseeing
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            After a series of long riding days, today is for rest and discovery. Wake up early if you like and ride up to Sarangkot for sunrise views over the Annapurna range. Later, visit Davis Falls, the World Peace Pagoda, or Gupteshwor Mahadev Cave. You can also try paragliding, ziplining, or boating ‚Äî Pokhara is the adventure capital of Nepal for good reason.
üìçOvernight: Pokhara
 üçΩ Meals: Breakfast

itinerary.title: Day 10
itinerary.description:
: Pokhara to Gorkha
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Distance: ~115 km | Ride Time: 5‚Äì6 hours
Leave behind the tourist buzz of Pokhara and head toward Gorkha, a historically rich town. The route cuts through peaceful rural landscapes, dotted with farming terraces and tiny tea shops. Gorkha is known as the birthplace of King Prithvi Narayan Shah, the unifier of Nepal. You can visit the Gorkha Durbar (palace) perched on a hill, offering sweeping views of the Himalayas.
üìçOvernight: Gorkha
 üçΩ Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Day 11
itinerary.description:
: Gorkha to Kathmandu
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Distance: ~135 km |Ride Time: 5‚Äì6 hours
Your last day of riding! Retrace your journey back to Kathmandu via scenic highways. As you return to the bustling city, you‚Äôll carry with you the dust, memories, and pride of having completed one of Nepal‚Äôs most iconic bike rides. Celebrate your achievement with your fellow riders over a hearty farewell dinner.
üìçOvernight: Kathmandu
 üçΩ Meals: Breakfast, Farewell Dinner

itinerary.title: Day 12
itinerary.description:
: Departure
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Depending on your flight time, enjoy a final breakfast and perhaps a quick souvenir run in Thamel. Our team will drop you off at the airport with a smile and a Namaste, marking the end of your incredible Himalayan journey.
üìçOvernight: ‚Äî
 üçΩ Meals: Breakfast

booking_info.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 7 days before departure

title: Haleshi Mahadev temple Tour-1N/2D
description: Setting out from Kathmandu in the early morning, embark on a picturesque 12-14 hour journey to reach the sacred destination of Haleshi Mahadev. Upon a...

itinerary.title: Day 1
itinerary.description:
: Arrival in Haleshi Mahadev
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Depart from Kathmandu early in the morning (around 6:00 AM) by private vehicle or public bus to Haleshi Mahadev, Khotang. The journey by road takes approximately 12-14 hours, depending on road conditions and traffic. Along the way, you'll pass through beautiful landscapes, small towns, and winding mountain roads. Arrive at Haleshi Mahadev in the evening. Check-in at a guesthouse or hotel near Haleshi Mahadev temple. Spend the evening exploring the area and visiting the temple.

itinerary.title: Day 2
itinerary.description:
: Explore Haleshi Mahadev  and Departure Kathmandu
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Wake up early and visit Haleshi Mahadev temple for morning prayers and meditation. After breakfast, explore the surroundings and visit other nearby attractions such as Maratika Cave (Halesi Cave) and Siddha Baba Mandir. Depart from Haleshi Mahadev by midday for the return journey to Kathmandu. Arrive back in Kathmandu in the late evening.

booking_info.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 7 days before departure

title: Annapurna Basecamp Trek For Indian -10Days/9Nights
description: Annapurna Base Camp Trek - 10N/9DTrip Overview: Are you looking to explore the stunning Annapurna Base Camp but don't have much time? Don't worry! We'...

itinerary.title: Day 01
itinerary.description:
: Arrival at Kathmandu and sightseeing
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            As per flight time, our representative will be there at airport  for pick up and drop you to the hotel. After refreshment  proceed for the sightseeing tour of Pasupatinath Temple 
and Swyambhunath stupa. During Free time you can roam  around Thamel market for shopping. Overnight at Kathmandu. 
Meals: Dinner
Accommodation: 3-star Hotel

itinerary.title: Day 02
itinerary.description:
: Drive to Pokhara or fly to Pokhara (820m)
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Today you will be received by a driver and will be driving to  Pokhara. Upon arrival we will be checking-in in the property reserved. After a short refreshment in the property you will have 
the rest of the day to yourself during which you can walk around Lakeside or enjoy the nightlife of Pokhara.

Meals: Dinner
Accommodation: 3-star Hotel

itinerary.title: Day 03
itinerary.description:
: Drive to Naya pool and trek to Ghandurk (1,940m)
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            After morning breakfast, we will drive to Naya Pool (2 ‚Äì 3 hour approx). We will take a short break have a meal, stretch up and get going. Being the first day we will be doing a short trek to 
get use to the terrain. After a trek of approximately an hour or two we will be able to get to Ghandruk, a beautiful village mostly inhabited by the Gurung community. We will be staying the night at Ghandruk homestay.
Meals: Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner
Accommodation: Teahouse

itinerary.title: Day 04
itinerary.description:
: Trek to Chhomrong (2,170m)
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            After a refreshing breakfast we will continue our trek. We descend for a while before making a pleasant ascent to  Chhomrong from Kimrong Khola after another arduous trek to Chere Danda. Great views of Gangapurna, Hiunchuli, Fishtail Mountain (Machhapuchhre), and Annapurna South are available as we travel. We make a rapid descent to reach the Kimrong Khola.

Meals: Breakfast, Lunch, and Dinner
Accommodation: Teahouse

itinerary.title: Day 05
itinerary.description:
: Trek from Chhomrong to Dovan (2,820m)
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            We move through a wet, damp bamboo woodland before making a steady ascent with a few steep stretches. The forest only opens up and we are  once more outside in the sunshine with 
breathtaking views of the glacier river below once we reach Himalaya Hotel.
Meals: Breakfast, Lunch, and Dinner
Accommodation: Teahouse

itinerary.title: Day 06
itinerary.description:
: Trek from Dovan to Annapurna Base Camp (4,130m)
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Carefully ascend through a riverside and then cross a rocky trail to reach the hillside. It's a 
moderately challenging hike from Bagar to Machhapuchhre Base Camp. It is undoubtedly a 
pleasant experience to see the spectacular Machhapuchhre, Mt. Hiunchuli, Annapurna 
South, Annapurna I, Annapurna III, Gandharvachuli, and Gangapurna from Machhapuchhre base camp.
Meals: Breakfast, Lunch, and Dinner
Accommodation: Teahouse

itinerary.title: Day 07
itinerary.description:
: Descend from Annapurna Base Camp to Bamboo (2,815m)
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            We reverse our route back to Bamboo after leaving the Annapurna base camp. The journey 
today is downhill, so it shouldn't be too challenging. In addition, we will always have the 
magnificent scenery to lighten the mood.
Meals: Breakfast, Lunch, and Dinner
Accommodation: Teahouse

itinerary.title: Day 08
itinerary.description:
: Trek from Bamboo to Siwai and Drive back to Pokhara (820m)
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            We have the opportunity to take in the breathtaking western Nepali hill scenery as we trek down to Siwai. After a short walk we will get to the bus stop where our ride will be waiting for us and we will drive back Pokhara. Upon arrival we will be checking into the hotel and get refreshed. We will be having our lunch and going for a sightseeing of magestic Pokhara. 
Meals: Breakfast, Lunch, and Dinner
Accommodation: Teahouse

itinerary.title: Day 09
itinerary.description:
: Fly from Pokhara to Kathmandu (1350m)
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Today after a lovely breakfast in the hotel. As per our flight time, we will be flying or 
driving back to kathmandu and sightseeing tour of Bouddhanath stupa and Patan Durbar 
square. Overnight at kathmandu.
Meals: Breakfast, and Dinner
Accommodation: 3-star Hotel or Similar

itinerary.title: Day 10
itinerary.description:
: Drive back to Kathmandu
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            After breakfast, as per flight timing proceed towards international airport for flight back to home with the beautiful memories of Nepal 
tour.

title: Ama Yangri-2 Days/1 Night
description: Ama Yangri is located something about 90km north of Kathmandu Valley which is highest peak that is nearest from the Captial City Kathmandu. Ama Yangri...

itinerary.title: Day 1
itinerary.description:
: Drive from Kathmandu to Chumothang Resort
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Early Morning Gather at one location our vehicle will pick up and we will be further Heading towards Chumothang Resort which takes you around 7-8 hours . after refreshment you will have camp fire and enjoy with your friend. Dinner will be serve at Hotel. Overnight at Hotel.

itinerary.title: Day 2
itinerary.description:
: Trek to Ama yangri and drive back to Kathmandu
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Early Morning, Before sunrise Hike to Ama yangri top to Witness the  mesmerizing sunrise with the views of Langtang Mountains range, Manasalu, and others various peak. Later hike down to Hotel have breakfast and Proceed further towards kathmandu.
