title: Pokhara and Sarangkot Tour 2N/3D
description: Pokhara & Sarangkot Tour from Kathmandu: A Journey to Nepal‚Äôs SerenityWhen it comes to travel in Nepal, Pokhara and Sarangkot remain timeless favorite...

itinerary.title: Day 1
itinerary.description:
: Arrive in the beautiful city of Pokhara
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            arrive in the beautiful city of Pokhara after a scenic drive or short flight from Kathmandu. After hotel check-in, spend your afternoon exploring the calm surroundings of Phewa Lake with a relaxing boat ride to Tal Barahi Temple, followed by a visit to Davis Falls and the mystical Gupteshwor Cave. In the evening, enjoy a peaceful stroll along Lakeside, filled with lively caf√©s, shops, and a vibrant atmosphere.

itinerary.title: Day 2
itinerary.description:
: Drive to Sarangkot
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Wake up early for a drive or cable car ride to Sarangkot, where you‚Äôll witness a breathtaking sunrise over the snow-capped peaks of Annapurna, Dhaulagiri, and Machhapuchhre. After returning for breakfast, continue with a half-day sightseeing tour covering the Bindhyabasini Temple, the International Mountain Museum, and the serene World Peace Pagoda, offering panoramic views of the valley. Adventure lovers can also add paragliding or zip-lining from Sarangkot for an extra thrill.

itinerary.title: Day 3
itinerary.description:
: Boating experience and Return to Kathmandu
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Enjoy a leisurely breakfast and perhaps a final walk or boating experience at Phewa Lake before bidding farewell to Pokhara. You will then depart for Kathmandu or your onward destination, carrying with you unforgettable memories of Pokhara‚Äôs natural beauty and Sarangkot‚Äôs magical sunrise.

booking_info.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 7 days before departure

title: Chitwan National Park 2N/3D
description: Chitwan National Park Tour from Kathmandu: A Wildlife Adventure in NepalEscape the hustle and bustle of Kathmandu and step into the wild with the Chit...

itinerary.title: Day 1
itinerary.description:
: Kathmandu to  Chitwan
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Morning drive/fly from Kathmandu to Chitwan. On arrival, welcome drink and check-in. After lunch, relax at the resort. Late afternoon, stroll to the riverside for sunset views. In the evening, enjoy Tharu Cultural Dance with folk music and storytelling. Dinner & overnight at the resort.

itinerary.title: Day 2
itinerary.description:
: Full-Day Jungle Activities
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Early breakfast, then head for Jeep Safari inside the national park to spot one-horned rhino, deer, wild boar, monkeys, and if lucky, the elusive Bengal tiger. Later, a peaceful canoe ride along the Rapti/Riu rivers to see crocodiles and water birds, followed by a short guided jungle walk and birdwatching. Visit the Elephant Breeding Center (observational/educational). Return to resort, free time, dinner & overnight.

itinerary.title: Day 3
itinerary.description:
: Chitwan ‚ûù Kathmandu
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Wake up to birdsong; optional short village walk. Breakfast, check-out, and drive/fly back to Kathmandu with wonderful memories.

booking_info.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 7 days before departure

title: Annapurna Base Camp Trek (7N/8D)
description: The Annapurna Base Camp (ABC) Trek is one of Nepal‚Äôs most iconic adventures, combining stunning Himalayan scenery, cultural richness, and rewarding tr...

itinerary.title: Day 1
itinerary.description:
: Kathmandu to Pokhara (820m | 6‚Äì7 hrs drive / 25 min flight)
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Your journey begins with a scenic drive or a short flight from Kathmandu to Pokhara. If you choose to drive, the route takes you along winding roads with views of hills, rivers, and countryside settlements, while the flight offers breathtaking glimpses of the Himalayan range in just 25 minutes. Upon reaching Pokhara, you‚Äôll settle into your hotel and have the evening free to explore Lakeside, where the calm waters of Phewa Lake beautifully reflect Machhapuchhre (Fishtail) and Annapurna South. Overnight stay at Pokhara.

itinerary.title: Day 2
itinerary.description:
: Pokhara to Ghandruk via Nayapul (1,940m | 1.5 hr drive + 5‚Äì6 hrs trek)
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            After breakfast, a short drive takes you to Nayapul, the starting point of your trek. From here, you begin your journey on foot, passing terraced fields, rivers, and charming villages. The trail gradually ascends as you make your way to the traditional Gurung village of Ghandruk, famous for its rich culture and warm hospitality. Along the way and especially from the village itself, you‚Äôll be rewarded with stunning views of Annapurna South, Hiunchuli, and Machhapuchhre (Fishtail). Overnight in Ghandruk.

itinerary.title: Day 3
itinerary.description:
: Ghandruk to Chhomrong (2,170m | 5‚Äì6 hrs trek)
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Today‚Äôs trek begins with a descent through stone-paved paths towards Kimrong Khola, followed by a steady climb uphill through lush forests of oak and rhododendron. The trail then levels out as you reach Chhomrong, a large Gurung settlement nestled on the lap of the Annapurna range. From here, you‚Äôll have majestic, close-up views of Annapurna South and Machhapuchhre, making Chhomrong one of the most scenic villages along the route. Overnight in Chhomrong.

itinerary.title: Day 4
itinerary.description:
: Chhomrong to Bamboo (2,310m | 5‚Äì6 hrs trek)
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            From Chhomrong, you descend a series of stone steps to the Chhomrong Khola and cross a suspension bridge. The trail then climbs steadily through thick forests of bamboo, oak, and rhododendron until you reach a small settlement aptly named Bamboo. The air here is cooler and fresher, with the forest canopy surrounding you, offering a peaceful trekking experience. Overnight in Bamboo.

itinerary.title: Day 5
itinerary.description:
: Bamboo to Deurali (3,230m | 5‚Äì6 hrs trek)
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            The trail today passes through dense forests, gradually opening up to reveal the rugged landscapes of the Annapurna region. You‚Äôll climb past Dovan and Himalaya villages, with waterfalls cascading along the trail. As you approach Deurali, the vegetation begins to thin, and the valley widens with dramatic cliffs on both sides. From this point, you start to see glimpses of Machhapuchhre and Hiunchuli peeking through the ridges. Overnight in Deurali.

itinerary.title: Day 6
itinerary.description:
: Deurali to Annapurna Base Camp via Machhapuchhre Base Camp (4,130m | 6‚Äì7 hrs trek)
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            This is one of the most rewarding days of the trek. From Deurali, you ascend steadily along the valley to reach Machhapuchhre Base Camp (3,700m), where the sight of Machhapuchhre (Fishtail) towering above will leave you in awe. The trail continues to rise until you reach Annapurna Base Camp (4,130m), surrounded by a natural amphitheater of towering peaks including Annapurna I, Annapurna South, Hiunchuli, Machhapuchhre, and Tent Peak. The 360¬∞ panorama from ABC is simply breathtaking and one of the most iconic views in the Himalayas. Overnight at Annapurna Base Camp.

itinerary.title: Day 7
itinerary.description:
: Annapurna Base Camp to Bamboo (2,310m | 6‚Äì7 hrs trek)
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Wake up early to witness the sunrise over the Annapurna range‚Äîa moment that will stay with you forever. The morning sun lights up Annapurna I, Machhapuchhre, Hiunchuli, and South Annapurna in golden hues. After enjoying this unforgettable spectacle, you retrace your steps down the valley, descending past Machhapuchhre Base Camp, Deurali, and Himalaya before reaching Bamboo. Overnight in Bamboo.

itinerary.title: Day 8
itinerary.description:
: Bamboo to Pokhara via Chhomrong & Nayapul (6‚Äì7 hrs trek + 1.5 hr drive)
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Your final trekking day begins with a gradual descent through forests and stone steps back to Chhomrong, where you‚Äôll once again be greeted with views of Annapurna South and Machhapuchhre. After descending to Nayapul, you‚Äôll take a short drive back to Pokhara. The trek officially ends here, and you can celebrate your achievement with some leisure time in Pokhara, strolling by Phewa Lake or enjoying the vibrant Lakeside atmosphere. Overnight in Pokhara.

title: Ghorepani Poon Hill Trek 4N/ 5D
description: IntroductionThe Ghorepani Poon Hill Trek is the ultimate short Himalayan journey for those who wish to experience breathtaking mountain views, charmin...

itinerary.title: Day 1
itinerary.description:
: kathmandu to pokhara
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Begin your journey with a scenic drive (or flight) from Kathmandu to Pokhara, Nepal‚Äôs picturesque lake city. Along the way, enjoy views of rivers, terraced fields, and rolling hills. Upon arrival in Pokhara, you can explore the lakeside area with stunning Himalayan backdrops.

itinerary.title: Day 2
itinerary.description:
: pokhara to ghorepani vai ulleri
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            After breakfast, drive to Nayapul and start your trek. Passing through lush forests, small villages, and stone steps at Ulleri, the trail gradually ascends towards Ghorepani. The day offers beautiful landscapes and glimpses of local Gurung and Magar culture. Overnight stay at Ghorepani with magnificent mountain views.

itinerary.title: Day 3
itinerary.description:
: morning poon hill sunrise, trek to ghandruk
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Early morning hike to Poon Hill (3,210m) for a breathtaking sunrise over Annapurna and Dhaulagiri ranges. After capturing the magical panorama, trek down to Ghorepani for breakfast and continue your journey through rhododendron forests and traditional villages before reaching the charming Gurung village of Ghandruk. Overnight at Ghandruk with close-up views of Annapurna South, Hiunchuli, and Machhapuchhre (Fishtail).

itinerary.title: Day 4
itinerary.description:
: ghandruk to pokhara
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Wake up to serene mountain views, explore Ghandruk‚Äôs traditional Gurung culture, and then descend towards Nayapul. From there, drive back to Pokhara, where the trek concludes. Spend the evening relaxing by Phewa Lake or exploring the vibrant lakeside.

booking_info.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 7 days before departure
